long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Therapy Mood Tracker, created by a Registered Psychologist in Calgary, Alberta, is a Chrome extension designed to illuminate the impact of therapy on your emotional health. This tool simplifies the process of tracking your daily emotional state and brings clarity to your therapeutic journey through its chart function.

Therapy Mood Tracker serves as your personal emotional barometer, offering valuable insights by allowing you to compare your mood during periods of your life where you attend therapy sessions against periods without therapy. Visualize your mood fluctuations over time with ease, identifying patterns and shifts that may otherwise go unnoticed.
